"Xiemmy": "Ah... You're here. Oh, um... Let me introduce myself once more."
"I am Xiemmy. As a member of the Technological Development team, I'm in charge of the development of the equipment you'll be using out on the field."
"...So, uhm... Moving along..."
"Ah... You're here. Thank you very much."
"Um... Well, I'm... really glad you agreed to help me."
"A-Anyways... Um, moving on..."
"Are you familiar with Limit Breaking your equipment?"
"Bringing out the full potential of your gear is... Well, it's very important, you see..."
"But lately... I see a lot of people are neglecting to Limit Break their gear."
"And well, in hopes that others follow by your example, I would like to have others witness you performing a Limit Break on some gear."
"Would you be willing to let us record you... as you gather the materials you need?"
"I will transfer some of the required materials over to you now. Can you please collect the remainder?"
"Um... I really appreciate you going through all this trouble for us."
"Received Stragment A x7, Stragment B x7, Stragment C x7, N-Excube x1."
"Received Stragment A x1, Stragment B x1, Stragment C x1."
"Ah, welcome... back."
"Thank... you, um... for collecting the materials."
"I was able to capture some good footage, so... I hope to be able to show it to other ARKS members."
"Now, up next is the... actual Limit Breaking, of course."
"Oh, don't worry... I won't be recording this part... Everyone has their own gear preferences, after all..."
"...This time, please just use the materials you acquired on... any piece of equipment you would like to strengthen..."
"Equipment can be quite customizable, so I would be... glad to see what you come up with..."
"Thank you for... um, all your cooperation."
"I l-look forward to our... continued endeavors..."
"As I thought, I'm really... not cut out for this... publicity work..."
"I-Is there something... I can help you with?"
"I'm going to, um... keep working hard to teach everyone... more about the equipment they use."
"I-Is there something... I can help you with?"
